Rhino Combat Suit Bundle (Male)
kDesc
This combat suit comes equipped with weapons for any hostile situation. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, gloves and boots. [#Legal]
Cette tenue de combat est équipée de toutes les armes nécessaires en cas de situation hostile. L'ensemble comprend un casque, un haut, un bas, des gants et des bottes. [#Legal]
Zu diesem Kampfanzug gehören Waffen für alle Gefechtssituationen. Das Set enthält Helm, Oberteil, Unterteil, Handschuhe und Stiefel. [#Legal]
Questa tuta da combattimento è dotata di armi per ogni situazione critica. Il pacchetto include casco, corazza, pantaloni, guanti e stivali. [#Legal]
Este traje de combate incorpora armas para afrontar cualquier tipo de hostilidades. El conjunto comprende casco, parte superior, parte inferior, guantes y botas. [#Legal]
어떠한 적대상황에서도 사용 가능한 전투복입니다. 이 세트는 헬멧, 상의, 하의, 장갑, 그리고 부츠를 포함합니다. [#Legal]
This combat suit comes equipped with weapons for any hostile situation. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, gloves and boots. [#Legal]
這套格鬥服飾包括可用來應付任何艱險情況的武器。本服裝組包括頭盔、上身、下身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
這套格鬥服飾包括可用來應付任何艱險情況的武器。本服裝組包括頭盔、上半身、下半身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
This combat suit comes equipped with weapons for any hostile situation. Bundle includes helmet, top, bottom, gloves and boots. [#Legal]
